name: Cali's Geo Tools
description:
Front of Sleeve - PlayStation (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

Welcome to Cali's exciting tool room! Using shapes, patterns, symmetry, and spatial relationships, these fun and challenging Lightspan activities give your child a chance to "shape up" his or her geometry.

LEARNING OBJECTIVES
  • Explore concepts of symmetry
  • Develop spacial sense
  • Identify and continue patterns of geometric figures
  • Compare Shapes
  • Explore concepts of congruence
  • Use problem-solving skills and strategies>/li>
